item.title: FT Most Read: Sunday, April 27, 2025 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. LNG companies say they cannot comply with Trump rules on Chinese ships
2. [Opinion] Musk needs to become a more normal CEO
3. Trade war hits foreign companies in China with double tariffs
4. UK faces biggest political shake-up in 100 years as local elections loom, says Curtice
5. Saudi Arabia and Qatar to repay Syria’s debts to World Bank
item.guid: FT Most Read: Sunday, April 27, 2025 at 11:15 PM UTC
